docs.lead_paragraph: Poland named a center-right MEP as its candidate for European Council President on Saturday after it said it would oppose the re-appointment of former prime minister Donald Tusk as the chairman of EU leaders.

headline.print_headline: Poland Wants Center-Right MEP to Replace Tusk as European Council Head
headline.main: Poland Wants Center-Right MEP to Replace Tusk as European Council Head

docs.snippet: Poland named a center-right MEP as its candidate for European Council President on Saturday after it said it would oppose the re-appointment of former prime minister Donald Tusk as the chairman of EU leaders....

docs.lead_paragraph: Standard Life and Aberdeen Asset Management, two of Scotland's most well-known financial firms, are in talks over an 11 billion pound ($13.5 billion) tie-up to create Britain's largest investment manager.

headline.print_headline: Scottish Investors Standard Life, Aberdeen Mull $13.5 Billion Tie-Up
headline.main: Scottish Investors Standard Life, Aberdeen Mull $13.5 Billion Tie-Up

docs.lead_paragraph: Federal officials say more than two dozen aircraft have violated airspace restrictions near President Donald Trump's estate in Florida.

headline.print_headline: FAA: 27 Airspace Violations Near Trump's Florida Estate

docs.lead_paragraph: Some 110 people have died in southern Somalia in the last two days from famine and diarrhea resulting from a drought, the prime minister said on Saturday, as the area braces itself for widespread shortages of food.

headline.print_headline: Somalia Says 110 Dead in Last 48 Hours Due to Drought
headline.main: Somalia Says 110 Dead in Last 48 Hours Due to Drought

docs.snippet: Some 110 people have died in southern Somalia in the last two days from famine and diarrhea resulting from a drought, the prime minister said on Saturday, as the area braces itself for widespread shortages of food....

docs.lead_paragraph: A court-ordered DNA test shows a man who has long claimed to be the father of the late boxing champ Johnny Tapia is not his dad after all, in the latest saga involving the troubled boxer after his death.

headline.print_headline: DNA Test Shows Man Not Biological Father of Late Boxer Tapia
headline.main: DNA Test Shows Man Not Biological Father of Late Boxer Tapia

docs.lead_paragraph: A mother and four children were killed when flames swept through their rural Massachusetts home early Saturday, fire officials said.

headline.print_headline: 4 Children, Mother Die in Massachusetts Blaze

docs.lead_paragraph: Canada is enforcing border laws and is willing to put more resources in place to deal with the influx of asylum-seekers from the United States, federal Public Safety Minister Ralph Goodale said Saturday.

headline.main: Canada Minister Addresses Influx of Asylum-Seekers From US

docs.lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic has lost the tenacity which enabled him to rule men's tennis for a number of years, former mentor Niki Pilic said on Saturday.
